title: Altering Custom Table Columns in Umbraco Migrations
description: The article explains how to alter custom table columns in Umbraco migrations, specifically when increasing the size of an NVARCHAR column to NVARCHAR(MAX).

title: Find Ancestors of Item Using the Umbraco Content Delivery API
description: This article explains how to use the Umbraco Content Delivery API to fetch the ancestors of a node, useful for building breadcrumb navigation in headless Umbraco setups.

title: Importing Block List Items Programmatically in Umbraco 17
description: A practical, problem-solving guide on how to import Block List items programmatically in Umbraco 17 instead of manually creating them in the backoffice.

title: Contributing to Umbraco CMS by fixing a bug
description: Explore the rewarding experience of contributing to Umbraco CMS by identifying and fixing bugs.

title: Adding Custom Request Headers to Umbraco Forms Workflow
description: Learn how we can customize an Umbraco Forms Workflow to send in HTTP Request Headers.
